resources.string:
1. Signing In
For the first use of this app, you must sign in using your e-mail and password. After you sign in, you cannot sign out, so be careful. One phone is registered for one user.

2. Checking In/Out
After signing in, you can start checking in/out by clicking the "Check In/Check Out" toggle button. Only registered user who is in the range of the their respective office(s) can check-in/out. There is a case where you have checked-in without using your device and have not check-out. In that case, the toggle button may still be "Check In" button. To be able to check-out, simply click the toggle button to change it to "Check Out" button. The same goes for another case.

3. Sending Absence Message
In the "Check In/Out" page click the option menu button then click "Send Absence Message" to send absence excuse message to your HR department.

4. Showing Daily Worktime
You can see your daily worktime. Simply go to "Show Performance" page by clicking "Show Performance" button in "Check-In/Out" page. In "Performance" page, you can see your worktime daily by selecting "from" date and "to" date and then click "Show" button.

5. Activating Notification
You can also add notification to remind you to check in and/or out. Simply go to "Notification" page by clicking "Set Notification" button in the "Check-In/Out" page. You can choose which notification to activate and on what time it should notify you. To cancel a notification, simply uncheck the respective check box.

6. Modifying Notification Settings
In "Notification" page click the option menu button then click "Settings" to modify notification settings. You can choose to change the time format and/or notification ringtone.
